img_above_text:
# Gray-Bronze Cart

Gray-Bronze Cart is a Yaoguai Chief boss fight that you'll go up against at the start of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. Blocking the pathway to the Ashen Pass II, the cart is just one of the Five Element Carts you'll need to fight in this Chapter.

## How to Find Gray-Bronze Cart
img_below_text: After the fight with Father of Stones, go through the door and follow the path. You'll come to a cave, which you'll need to pass through to go to the lower level of the valley.

img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:  
The preceding text introduces the "Gray-Bronze Cart," a Yaoguai Chief boss encountered at the start of Chapter 5 in *Black Myth: Wukong*. This boss blocks the pathway to Ashen Pass II and is one of the Five Element Carts that players must defeat in this chapter.

Image Summary:  
The image depicts a pathway leading to a closed wooden door, marked with a red arrow to indicate the next step in the player's journey. The setting is a dimly lit, rocky environment with sparse vegetation and a traditional stone structure, suggesting progression toward the location of the Gray-Bronze Cart.

Following Text Summary:  
The following text provides guidance on reaching the next area after defeating the Father of Stones. It instructs players to pass through the door shown in the image and follow the path into a cave, which leads to the lower level of the valley.
